snippet.title: Other&Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks Revisit31: Heart of the Hedgehog (Demo 2 & SAGE2004)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Heart of the Hedgehog - Demo 2 & SAGE2004
Credit: Super Napalm
Release Date: July 25th, 2003 - June 21st, 2004

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: Only on Site.
Demo 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=02oq8hrkrnk

(Demo 2)
00:00 - Boot
00:17 - Atomic City Brief
00:32 - Boss 1 Brief
01:08 - Ice Cap Brief
01:57 - Ice Cap Act 2
04:19 - Cutscene 1
04:49 - TEE Base Zone
06:35 - Cutscene 2
06:58 - Final Boss
08:50 - Credits Brief

(SAGE2004)
09:29 - Boot
09:43 - Title
10:37 - Cutscene 1
11:33 - Green Hill Zone Act 1
14:08 - Green Hill Zone Act 2
15:45 - Cutscene 2
16:24 - Boss 1
17:59 - Ice Cap Zone Act 1
20:48 - Ice Cap Zone Act 2
24:20 - Cutscene 3
25:00 - Boss 2
27:29 - TEE Base Zone
30:48 - Cutscene 4
31:31 - Final Boss
36:47 - Ending
38:50 - Credits
41:52 - Little bit more of Super Sonic Gameplay

NOTES: When I was young,
It seemed that fangames were so speedyful,
A joy, oh it was interesting, fascinating
And all the these fangames on the net
Well they'd were singing so happily,
So joyfully, oh playfully, lost in time...

*COUGH* That's enough of that none sense.
NOW here we take a revisit back at "Heart of the Hedgehog"
So turns out there was more than just one Demo of this game and well here are the rest.
With the exception of SAGE2004 Demo but it should be mostly the same as the one I have here but with less levels.
ANYWAY, this game... It gives me conflicting opinions.
Why is that? well I like it and I dislike at the exact same time.
Demo 1 - for instance I liked the Music choice for Ice Cap More.
Demo 2 - replaced a lot of the music (Not that it's bad just... different to my preference)
SAGE2004 - Now this version while it looks like the complete game I think?
It has oh so many flaws, the physics engine is worse in terms of how Sonic Jumps around.
The levels have been downgraded by... like a lot.
I would call TEE Base the only decent level while Zone 1 and 2 have been turned into plain linear levels.
Eggman as a boss has also been made much less difficult than before.
The drawing cutscene art is nice tho.
Overall this is not all bad visually or music wise but Demo1&2 feel much more superior to the SAGE one.
Even if they all have their own flaws.
Personally I think it should have kept it's D1/D2 style and physics + Level design and improved em further.

(PASSWORDS)

(D2)

atmcbomb
flibflab
freeze
chasee
TEE
TEE2
bbb
flibflob

(S2004)

nosp00n
boss1
freeze
up
wtrchase
boss2
TEA
